VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Unsafe implementation of  fundLoan()  allows attacker to steal collateral from an unfunded loan.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Read treasuryFee, investorFee, mapleTreasury, poolDelegate from an authoritative source instead

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: makePayment()  Lack of access control allows malicious  lender  to retrieve a large portion of the funds earlier, making the borrower suffer fund loss.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Enforce that a payment can only be made some window of time before it is due, to prevent anyone from prematurely paying it down

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Anyone can call  closeLoan()  to close the loan.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Add authorization check to ensure only the borrower can call closeLoan()
